Description: Deploy latest Datasafe core system updates including security patches and new API endpoints
Build member-facing portal for checking/savings account applications with e-signature integration
Comprehensive system to track past-due loans, automate collection workflows, and generate skip-trace reports

Implement automated failover to backup data center with RPO < 1 hour and RTO < 4 hours
